Package goGame

Class BoardTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • goGame.BoardTools
  • public class BoardTools
extends java.lang.Object
    BoardTools, to check and execute for captures, and get the scores. Must be used by Game, to enforce the rules (local or as server) May be used as Player, to calculate the result of a certain move (mimicking expected server response)
    Author:
    huub.lievestro

      BoardTools​(boolean printDebug)
      Create a new instance of BoardTools to use.

      Count scores on board (area scoring + stones).
      boolean hasLiberty​(int index)
      Check if this stone has any liberty (= unoccupied space above/right/below/left of it).

      Check if this stone is surrounded by own stones (above, right, below and left).
      boolean surroundedOwnRecursive​(int index)

    • Method Detail

      • doOpponentCaptures

        public int doOpponentCaptures​(Board board,
                              Stone ownStone)
        Check for captures of opponent's stones and excute them.
        Parameters:
        board - board to check
        ownStone - color of current player (opposite of opponent)
        Returns:
        number of opponent stones which were captures

      • hasLiberty

        public boolean hasLiberty​(int index)
        Check if this stone has any liberty (= unoccupied space above/right/below/left of it).
        Parameters:
        index - current stone
        Returns:
        true if current stone has one or more liberties, false if not

      • surroundedOwn

        public boolean surroundedOwn​(int index)
        Check if this stone is surrounded by own stones (above, right, below and left).
        Parameters:
        index - current stone
        Returns:
        true if surrounded by own stones, false if not

      • surroundedOwnRecursive

        public boolean surroundedOwnRecursive​(int index)
        Check if this stone is surrounded by own stones (above, right, below and left), ignoring already checked stones.
        Parameters:
        index - current stone
        Returns:
        true if surrounded by own stones, false if not

      • doOwnCaptures

        public int doOwnCaptures​(Board board,
                         Stone ownStone)
        Check for captures of own stones and execute them.
        Parameters:
        board - board to check
        ownStone - colour of current player (opposite of opponent)

      • getScores

        public java.lang.String getScores​(Board board,
                                  double komi)
        Count scores on board (area scoring + stones).
        Parameters:
        board - to count
        komi - to add to white core
        Returns:
        String with scores
